MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G72 postcode area of Blantyre. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:20am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to replace a broken electricity pole and repair a grounded power line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:54am on Thursday, 08 April 2021
